Nicholes Wong, Diploma in Business Management at Nanyang PolytechnicLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 06 Apr 2019Based on the T&Cs, no. You can take a look at Citi SMRT card. They give 1.7% for ez reload $40 and above and extra 0.3% if you spend $300 or more on the card.0 comments0
